channel.title: Website- Rate and Feedback
channel.description:
Ok, well this is my new website. It is called Programmers Union, and it will end up being mostly a forum with a small team that works on projects etc. Ok but anyway, I was wandering how this looks. Note that the website is still far from done. I am still working on adding alot of different features, including the forums. Thanks for reading, and hope to see some postitive feedback ;)
Website: [url=http://www.progunion.ulmb.com]www.progunion.ulmb.com[/url]

item.title: Website- Rate and Feedback
item.dc:creator: @Songoty Songoty
item.description:
@Songoty wrote:

Yea, the navigation is really close together, it looks awkword. Other then that i like it.

Read full topic

item.title: Website- Rate and Feedback
item.dc:creator: @error.login cane
item.description:
@error.login wrote:

try and reduce the width of your title image so it is the same size as the middle. 978px i think

Read full topic

item.title: Website- Rate and Feedback
item.dc:creator: @Spikey_Hair Spikey Hair
item.description:
@Spikey_Hair wrote:

[quote=“kloplop321, post:2, topic:175838”]3/10 but has potential
needs a better title image, I would suggest you make the lines going diagonal(thicker)(your choice of direction) and maybe more contrast and not as much bland-ness
make it use the whole page(not just the top left)
but it can be better, and some stuff on the right side just to make it even.[/quote]
Thanks for the feedback, and Ill try that out. Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Website- Rate and Feedback
item.dc:creator: @kloplop321 kloplop321
item.description:
@kloplop321 wrote:

3/10 but has potential
needs a better title image, I would suggest you make the lines going diagonal(thicker)(your choice of direction) and maybe more contrast and not as much bland-ness
make it use the whole page(not just the top left)
but it can be better, and some stuff on the right side just to make it even.

Read full topic
